full_summary:
### Title
Electric Vehicle Charging Stations
#### French Title
Station de charge pour véhicule électriques
### Reference Number
PW-22-01010383
### Solicitation Number
1000408216
### Tender Status
The tender has expired.

### Notice Details
These notice was published on [2022-10-18](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/18/77c89e0b937a670b843b6d7f4eec8e60/1000408216_-_npp_en.pdf) and (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/18/d872fbaf8337e912605130cd7de255c4/1000408216_-_npp_fr.pdf).

### Tender Description

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is doing a RFSA (Request for Supply Arrangement) to identify suppliers able to supply Electricity Vehicle Charging Stations. The RFSA is under the [Trade Agreement ID: 1000408216](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HN-373-80467). 

The Request for Supply Arrangement is to acquire 17 networked charging stations to be delivered to various Points of Entry (POE) across Canada. Suppliers must hold a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) under E60HN-21EVSE/B in order to bid on RFSA PW-22-01010383. 

Interested suppliers may contact:
- **Name**: Sophia Kuca
- **Email**: [sophia.kuca@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca](mailto:sophia.kuca@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca)
- **Phone**: 343-551-6913

The RFSA is posted on [Buyandsell.gc.ca](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HN-373-80467) for 15 days.

Attachments:
- [EN](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/18/77c89e0b937a670b843b6d7f4eec8e60/1000408216_-_npp_en.pdf)
- [Français](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/18/d872fb
